title: Easter bunny BARD skin idea
body:
Bard in a Easter bunny costume, hold a carrott  and the chimes are little easter eggs.

{{champion:432}}

replies.body: With meaps also being little eggs I love it!

> [{quoted}](name=blueyedmonkey123,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=fX2RIOsV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-08-26T07:22:41.949+0000)
>
> With meaps also being little eggs I love it!

Make the meeps little chicks.
Well, it would make sense since chime hunts are already like Easter egg hunts.
as long as the ult has a cross somewhere in it, for the added cringe value
